oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WTJS news and commercials
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WTJS, Jackson, TN news report and commercials read by Sam Lollar. Dated 1951-01-09 based on news reports.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Sam Lollar) -- News report (Sam Lollar) -- Hotpoint Dishwasher commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Corno Laying Mash commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Model Mill Co. commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Bear Ice And Coal Company commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Red Cross commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Drugstore event commercial (Sam Lollar) -- Star Laundry and Jackson Cleaners commercial (Sam Lollar)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WTJS (Radio staton : Jackson, Tenn.); Lollar, Sam Davis, 1921-1997
